title: How to use a memory card of E5786S-62A?
answer:
A：To use the device as a portable storage drive insert a microSDHC card up to 32GB: 

 • Slide in the memory card as shown until it clicks, then replace back cover. 

 • Connect the wireless device to your computer using the USB cable supplied and the memory card will display as an external drive. 

 • To remove memory card, push in card until it clicks and pops out. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=37534)
